lazy_href: Lenovo Rechargeable USI Pen for C13 Yoga
key_details: The Lenovo Rechargeable USI Pen for C13 Yoga is an ideal input solution giving users 4096 levels of pressure for precise content creation. This pen is unique to the Yoga C13 and it can be stored in the notebook pen slot made specifically for it. While being stored, the pen will be recharged and allow users to enjoy an up to 396 minutes (active use) of battery life of a single full charge.
